title: Control
description: Schema for defining a control in a SOX/ICFR context.

name.description: Short descriptive name for the control.

description.description: Details of the control's purpose or mechanism.

type.description: Indicates whether the control is manual or automated.

frequency.description: Frequency with which the control operates.

processId.description: ID referencing the business process this control belongs to.

assertionsAddressed.description: List of financial statement assertions this control helps address.

keyControl.description: Whether this control is considered 'key' for SOX/ICFR.

informationUsedIds.description: References (IDs) to any Information Used in Control (IUC).
